Wilmington DE October 2016 to Present Description OptumRx is a global leader in providing technology based Business Solutions and Services We are providing design and development services consolidating major applications of OptumRx to create an RxBuilder serviceoriented IT architecture We are responsible for Developing RxBuilder Application for the Data Processing System and quality reporting systems In the present application we are supporting the collection analysis reporting and clinical survey and project data from Medicare Part D and Medicaid providers Responsibilities
